The free version is limited\nto two accounts.\nTouch here to learn more.
About AquaMail Pro
To add more than two accounts, to use mail identities, and to remove the promo signature, purchase the Pro version unlocker on Google Play.
To add more than two accounts, to use mail identities, and to remove the promo signature, purchase the Pro version unlocker at the developer\'s web site.
To add more than two accounts, to use mail identities, and to remove the promo signature, install the 3CX Mobile Device Manager from Google Play and authenticate it with the management server.
